helpAnswer:
Hey %s! It looks like you need some help! 
I'm always listening so I'll do my best to respond to you.

These are the things I'm listening for:
**!when**: I'll tell you how much longer it is until the next iteration of GalaCon! Wooo!
**Assfart**: I honestly don't know why this is a thing...
**Bizaam**: BIIZAAAAAM!
**Who is best pony**: I'll definitely let you know who I think is best!
**[x] is best pony**: I have an opinion about this too.
**boop @target**: I'll go and boop the snoot of whomever you mention here! Don't boop me though, that's illegal.
**Fanta**: Unlike Perry, I like making Fanta jokes.
**hug @target**: I'll let the mentioned person know you hugged them. (You can also hug me. I like hugs too)
**Canni is worst pony**: I don't know why you would say something like this, but if you do it too often I'll just stop talking to you for a bit...

I also respond to you if you @mention me! But please don't be mad at me if I don't understand you.
I'll definitely respond to these things: 
**@Canni I'm sorry**: You know, for when you called me worst pony. That was mean, but I might just forgive you.
**@Canni I love you**: I like this one. It's much better than calling me worst pony.
**@Canni When is galacon**: I'll let you know how much longer it is until the next time we'll see each other at GalaCon!
**@Canni Can I have a hug**: Of course you can, silly! I love giving hugs!

And that's it! If you've any more questions about me, you should probably ask one of my creators.
